name: Flying Unicorn Simulator 2021
description:
Welcome to the best flying unicorn simulator of 2021. Fly your unicorn in endless sky , master your unicorn riding skills! Discover exciting islands and mountains! Rescue horses, pass the time challenges, enjoy being a unicorn!
You can do whatever you want in magical world of unicorns!


Flying Unicorn Simulator 2021 is made for all fans of unicorn games, Simulation games and mythology games.

Download and play for free!

Game Features
- Realistic Mountains & Islands
- Incredible flying unicorn model
- Stunning HD Graphics
- Realistic unicorn animations
- Beautiful Landscapes
- Easy and Free to use
Enjoy ツ

Premium membership subscription is provided on a monthly basis.
– Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- Your account will be charged for renewal of your subscription automatically within 24 hours after your current subscription expires.
- You can turn off auto-renewal by going to your iTunes account at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

Terms of use: http://www.extremesoft.co/TermsofService.html
Privacy policy: http://www.extremesoft.co/PrivacyPolicy.html
